segments.text: How can I be sure your products are of superior quality , as you promised ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: One of the reasons for our good quality products is because of our quality inspection system , which is the best of its kind .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: But a quality inspection system does not mean that each unit will always be up to the standard .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: We have trained analyzers to do quality analysis at the end of each part when we make the product . This means that no mistakes are made .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Your salesman also told me that each worker is trained to do quality analysis . Can you tell me a little about that ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Certainly . We provide quality analysis training as part of the training for all new workers , plus a week of further training every year .
segments.speaker: S2
